item.title: Version 2.0.12
item.description:
NameQuick v2.0.12

This release adds per‑folder filters, a cleaner menu bar with richer history, and sturdier processing.

Highlights

  • Folder Filters for auto‑processing per watch folder
  • Streamlined menu bar with thumbnails and full‑width actions
  • More resilient processing and clearer feedback

New

  • Folder Filters: include rules per watch folder (Starts with, Ends with, Contains, Wildcard, RegExp). Combine with Any/All, case‑insensitive. Configure via the folder’s hover toolbar (filter icon). Applies to auto‑processing only.

Improvements

  • Menu bar
    • Removed processing/queue block; focused on actions + “Recent Files”.
    • Added footer items: “See All History…” and “Clear History…” (with confirmation).
    • Recent rows: image thumbnails, subtle success/failure overlay, hover actions (Show in Finder, Copy names, Remove).
    • “See All History…” activates the app and navigates to Processed.
    • Single‑window behavior with openWindow(id: "main") avoids duplicates and reopens after close.

Fixes

  • Single‑file runs: removed brief “Queued” flicker; success HUD restored.
  • Batch processing: continues when individual files fail with clearer error details.
  • Notifications/queue: reduced duplicates and improved cleanup under load.
  • Folder access validation: stronger checks and clearer permission errors.

— Josef
